Reviews.Title: Be carefull: it's a scam.
Reviews.Author: Adolfo Etchegaray
Reviews.Content: I bought a factory unlocked iphone 5 from this vendor while I was in the visiting friends in USA in December. When I opened the sim tray it stroke me that there was an ATT nano Sim there. Back home, I  tried to activate the phone with my carrier from Argentina (Movistar) and the phone could not activate saying that my carrier's nanosim was imcompatible. So it seems like the iphone is actually locked (probably to ATT). We do not have oficial Apple Stores in my country so I'm stuck. Fortunatelly, I am travelling again to the USA in 15 days soI will book an appointment at San Francisco's Apple store to see if the can confirm that the iphone is locked and hoperfully  they can swap it for an unlocked unit.I have paid more than 700 dolars and I can't use this phone. This is outrageous.AVOID!!!

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase from Amazon
Reviews.Author: J.E
Reviews.Content: Most iPhone prices are higher than the retail price, Apple now sells the unlocked versions for $650, $750, and $850 for their 16,32 and 64 gb's. Don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Locked Phone
Reviews.Author: V. R. Chavez Jr. "chavez"
Reviews.Content: I ordered an Unlocked Phone and a friend brought it to Africa where I work and when I got it here, found out it was locked. Had to send it back with another friend to get my money back.

Reviews.Title: I don't recommend this seller AT ALL
Reviews.Author: Darien Lee
Reviews.Content: The phone was Defective not like they said "used like-new, just open box to check internet" Dropping calls and the Battery dying really fast.Plus, I also got a defective charger cable that i NEVER GOT BACK the new one from them. I don't recommend this seller AT ALL, they are selling BAD products over the internet.

Reviews.Title: Maravilloso
Reviews.Author: Juan Sanchez
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, aunque las diferencias con la versión anterior es poca.Entrega totalmente a tiempo, 100% recomendado.Van a disfrutar bastante de este excelente teléfono inteligente

Reviews.Title: I receive an used and broken iPhone
Reviews.Author: Tathiana Chedid
Reviews.Content: Because of the seller, Unlocked Phones, that sold me un used iPhone as brand new.Throught the serial number for Iphone, Apple checked that:It was an USED Iphone, bought in 2012 that someone returned to this store and this store provided an Apple care (extra garantee) and the phone is broked. This store, Unlocked Phones, selled to me an used broken Iphone as a brand new Iphone on october 15th/2013.I hope that this store named Unlock Phones, never work again with amazo.Best regards,Tathiana

Reviews.Title: Faulty product
Reviews.Author: Dafe
Reviews.Content: I had to write a second review for this product after using it for a week. The seller is a fake and a thief. The phone camera lens is cracked the keeps on hanging and i have to restart it over and over. The seller knew of these issues and sold them to me. My advice to all buyers never buy from this seller again she is a fake and a crook. Her explanation is that she is sorry the product did not meet my expectation, which means she knew what she was selling and thought she could get away with it. Well no horrible product like this would ever meet someone’s expectation. Please do not purchase from this seller

Reviews.Title: Pretty good!!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Medin
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly! Its a great phone, works in my country, its light and skinny! Perfect size, perfect color! Just perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: vincent
Reviews.Content: It is a great smartphone. Honestly if you have an iphone 3 of less, it worth the upgrade. But if you have an iphone 4s then wait for iphone 6 :)

Reviews.Title: sooo bad
Reviews.Author: Ayman hassuonah
Reviews.Content: I m sorry to tell you that I bought from YOUNGRAMSEYLORD  order prescribed as  black iphone 5brand  new 32gb unlockedBut i received it used with scratches and wearsAlso locked not worked with my sim card And 16 gb.so its fake

Reviews.Title: I Loved iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: Loved it.Would buy another one if I had more money. Very good phone, everybody loved it a lot. Thanks so much

Reviews.Title: it`s a trap..He shouldn`t be an amazon trusted seller!!
Reviews.Author: bassam almotiri
Reviews.Content: The Iphone wasn`t unlocked..when I tried to use my sim card it says that it isn`t from a supported carrier .. when I contacted the seller he said ( it was unlocked when I sent it)..If he didn`t want to cooperate he will be charged by the law..

Reviews.Title: This was a total scam
Reviews.Author: kent
Reviews.Content: These are the type of people who make you not want to buy anything on-line. I lost 500 dollars and will never trust buying on-line again. This is the type of seller who makes it difficult for other who are just starting out. I just can not express how much this seller should be in jail.

Reviews.Title: Box damaged, no documentation arrived with packaging, all evidence suggests this is not a new iPhone!
Reviews.Author: John E. Anderson
Reviews.Content: We are returning this product immediately - a very sad and sorry excuse for a "respectible product iPhone."We want our money back - a full refund.

Reviews.Title: A Good Phone That's Almost Great
Reviews.Author: Robert I. Hedges
Reviews.Content: I have previously owned an iPhone 4 and two Android smartphones, and this is my favorite cellphone yet. I generally like the interface updates, though there are annoyances to be found. First the good news. The iPhone 5 is thin and light, which I love. It's fast and Internet connectivity is generally quite good. The camera yields generally good photos, but mine has annoying shutter lag issues much like my iPhone 4 did; more distressing is that on mine the image that is presented onscreen is not the image actually captured. Depending on whether it is in a landscape or portrait format it cuts the top or the left side of the frame off. Imagine my extreme annoyance when I discovered that the majority of photos I took from the front row of a recent Joe Bonamassa concert lopped Joe's head off, but gave spectacular pictures of his shoes. (Joe's a snappy dresser, and they were very nice shoes.) This is such an annoyance I have thought of returning it for that alone, but I normally use a camera to take photographs, so I haven't yet. This doesn't seem to be a problem in video mode.Some improvements are not. The calendar is virtually impossible to sync with my AOL calendar (multiple trips to the Genius bar and reassurances that it's entirely compatible and they would fix it have ended up with nothing.) I'd just use a different calendar app, but I have a friend who is dedicated to the AOL calendar system, so this is a better solution for me for now (providing it ever works, anyway.) I also dislike the time zone functionality when entering items in my iPhone calendar. The phone clarity and signal strength aren't that great, honestly, and may be worse than my iPhone 4. I live with them, but am not a fan. Battery life is also not that good; I would much prefer a swappable battery, but Apple seems to think it knows better.Despite my relatively minor reservations (battery life and camera problems are my biggest concerns) I still like this phone. It's light, it's fast, it's powerful, and it's still a good choice. If I had to do it over again I'd get the 64GB version to have more onboard video memory, but careful allocation of TV programs lets 32GB work adequately for me. Having used this phone for a few months now I feel confident using it and recommend it to people who like the Apple IOS.

Reviews.Title: Damaged battery, wall charger and lightning cable
Reviews.Author: Raul Arana
Reviews.Content: The battery drains in less than 4 hoursNeither the wall charger or the accompanying lightning cable worked, I had buy new ones

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: aronson mitchell
Reviews.Content: It's unlocked but it won't activate correctly on Verizon.  Not worth the purchase other reviews for this product say the same thing,

Reviews.Title: it works great
Reviews.Author: Alex Limon
Reviews.Content: The specifications were exact: a very little scratch at the aluminum edge. The rest is perfect. I use it intensely every day and it works very well.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Maithuskers
Reviews.Content: I trust Apple devices indeed.iPhone 5 is one of the best smartphone in the market until now. Great features and fast processor.

Reviews.Title: Some Tips for novice buyers
Reviews.Author: AMZ_Stakeholder
Reviews.Content: 1. Some people/businesses will try to sell you a refurbished iPhone as new, and it will look and be packaged as like it was new. Call the original carrier to see if your iPhone had been activated previously, you might be surprised. Check by giving the IMEI.2. Sell you a crappy item on purpose, to charge 20% restocking fee.Buyer Beware!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Raul Mejias
Reviews.Content: I absolutely recommend this phone... Works just fine outside US with a SIM card from any phone carrier. No complains

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Manuela
Reviews.Content: Thanksss, its amazing! I am very happy with the purchase, all my regards and happy with the upgrade, was wonderful!

Reviews.Title: i got this as a gift for a friend

Reviews.Content: I got this for a gift to a exchange student I had in my home. He lives is West Africa and needed a unlock phone. he has said nothing bad about the phone. so I thank you

Reviews.Content: Phone is really nice but the charging cable sucks had buy new one and iOS has some problems but most we're fixed with updates

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Title: Great iPhone
Reviews.Author: Tobias
Reviews.Content: The Battery is not the best, but it is one year old, so it is ok. I love it. Great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Brittany Gonzales
Reviews.Content: It's great, using it now. Love it, when I ordered it, my iPhone was brought to my door sooner than expected. Awesome service.

Reviews.Title: just as expected
Reviews.Author: Diego M.
Reviews.Content: My daugther is expecting this iphone, and she is very Happy with it. the i[hone fullfill her needs is exactly as she imagine.

Reviews.Title: Came exactly as described***
Reviews.Author: Allison Perry
Reviews.Content: The seller was very honest and up front about the phone. It was exactly as described. The package did not have earbuds, but the charging cord($19.99) needed replacement. However, that little issue is not enough to downgrade the seller's rating. The phone is awesome, and it has been verified by the Apple Store to be genuine, and I already have it up and it is teaching me the way to use ios 7. That auto update occurred the morning after I activated service. I have three different sim chips and all three work just fine in the unlocked phone. I had to use a chip cutter to make the chips fit, but that was very easy to accomplish. GREAT SELLER!!!

Reviews.Content: EQUIPMENT IN EXCELLENT CONDITION, THE CODE IMEI TEAM NO COINSIDE AL OF THE BOX MAKES DEBLOQUEADO FACTORY BUT IN THE CONFIGURATION OF EQUIPMENT BRAND AT & T, BUT IN VENEZUELA ME WORKED VERY WELL, NOT GOOD TO AMAZON VERIFIED PRODUCTS OFFERED BY SELLERS , THANK GOD IT WORKS LIKE THE CELL PHONE, I MEAN THAT YOU OPERATE AS SOME FRIENDS IPOD.

Reviews.Title: I do not like housing's Hardware of side and rear panel.
Reviews.Author: khai vu
Reviews.Content: Side and rear panel of Iphone 5 very easy to be scratching , chipping. I never seen any phone like that, even cheapest phone on market now. Sorry to spend a 3/4 of thousand dollar to buy this phone. I used  16G Iphone 4, this phone's hardware very good, that why I purchased this Iphone 5. This time I wasted money. Last month I plant to buy Iphone 5S. But I think New Iphone  Wiil be WORSE.

Reviews.Title: It's an iPhone.
Reviews.Author: DP "mundodelguy"
Reviews.Content: Even when it doesn't come with the latest tech It's a phone you can trust and a post service it won't leave you hanging. Waiting for the iOS7.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipment and good quality
Reviews.Author: Val "Valefebvre"
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised to receive the product very fast in the mailbox.Only one surprise though: it came with no headphones...Apparently it wasn't written in the description, thus it didn't came with it; which is indeed weird to ship a new iphone in its original box but with no headphones...That part could have been better dealt with, that's why this isn't a five star.Other than that, their support is quick to reply via email and I got what I wanted on time, so it was quite a satisfying experience.

Reviews.Title: My I phone 5
Reviews.Author: manjula manoharan
Reviews.Content: Basically battery is getting drain out very fast not as expected.initially it was ok but after two months started this problem.

Reviews.Content: The heading says it all.  I bought a Galaxy S4 and thankfully the screen stopped working after two days so I want back to Apple.  I have learned my lesson!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Ofilia
Reviews.Content: They are just wonderful.  I had been wanting one and now I have it....got one for my daughter....these phones are absolutely great. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Thinner and faster
Reviews.Author: Sávio Ladeira

I had an iPhone 4 16gb and decided to upgrade because my home button was failing and the battery was starting to die.I had two android phones before and I think the iOS experience is much better. Cleaner interface, better apps and much less bugs and crashes.

Reviews.Title: Addicted to Phones was extremely Helpful!
Reviews.Author: Miffie
Reviews.Content: Of course the iPhone 5 32GB is a terrific phone.  It was a Christmas Present for my 36 yr old son.  What I'm referring to in the heading is that I inadvertently (because I'm from a different "century" as far as computer gizmos are concerned) purchased an iPhone 5 that was only useable with AT&T.;  My son has a contract with another cell phone service company.Long story short(er)... a manager at Addicted to Phones was very willing to rectify the mistake by allowing my son to ship the AT&T; iPhone back in exchange for an iPhone 5 compatible with his service company.I can't tell you how much we appreciated Addicted to Phones' customer relations.  Excellent!

Reviews.Title: I  use the unlocked iPhone 5 with the local phone carrier's regular Sim cards cut to Nano Sim size while abroad
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: I have been able to use the unlocked iPhone 5 with Regular Sim cards cut to Nano Sim size on both the Digicel and Cable and Wireless networks while in the Caribbean (Saint Lucia) - it was cheaper than trumping up roaming charges!The iPhone 5 with its bigger screen and Siri is a big hardware upgrade from my now archaic 2009 iPhone 3GS :)WHY  BUY  AN  UNLOCKED  iPHONE?I prefer not to commit to a contractI can sell my unlocked phone and upgrade without having to worry about being 'locked in' by my service provider.I prefer to activate the local phone carrier's Nano Sim for extended stays abroad - it works out cheaper for local calls and I can use Skype/Facetime/Magic Jack etc for my calls back home.RECOMMENDED: I like the Incase Pro bumper/case and the  Belt Clip Holster Case with VELCRO closureSEE MY PHOTO IN CUSTOMER IMAGESHope my review and photo was helpful ... Jeffrey A. (Jeff)

It can be used with any prepaid or post paid service.I hope Apple make this product available at lower prices to help people who genuinely need to travel abroad on a frequent basis.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Happy that this phone works in my country!

Reviews.Content: I'm from the US but live in South Africa. Phones in South Africa are really expensive so I needed an unlocked phone. I was nervous about purchasing an unlocked phone because I heard about all the bad experiences of people who thought they bought unlocked phones only to find out when they leave their country that the phone isn't really unlocked and they basically wasted so much money.So. Thanks Amazon for always being reliable!

Reviews.Title: The Phone is OK but,
Reviews.Author: Sherif Elshahed
Reviews.Content: The phone is OK, but the serial indicates that it is an AT&T; phone and not factory unlocked one, that's the reason for my rating.

Reviews.Title: fantastic phone

Reviews.Content: this phone was really unlocked and brand new as stated . i would strongly recommend it to iPhone users. cheers

Reviews.Title: Ripped me off

I've sent them about 4 emails so far and they've just been ignoring it. If you see anything that's been sold my Salesmachine, DON'T BUY IT!

I took my phone to tmobile to get my nano card and I activated the nano card, but then I found it "activation required"!! Gosh it is locked! And now both my old phone and this one cannot work because both of them do not have service.I'm trying to return it and get refund within this week and get a new one somewhere else.This is a FRAUD.

Reviews.Title: Don't my electronics for of amazon
Reviews.Author: Denyse Burton
Reviews.Content: These iPhone 5 are coming from people in china who steal the phone from the sweat shop and than make money off of them don't waste good money on this you have better changes of getting a good phone off eBay

Reviews.Title: the device is good but sometimes the signal doesn't work outside US
Reviews.Author: Abdullah
Reviews.Content: The problem that the device is unlocked but when I travel to Saudi Arabia I tried to put my sim card in some places the works very well but in another the device give me no signal, and the LTE doesn't work in Saudi Arabia

Reviews.Title: The best smartphone
Reviews.Author: Johan B.
Reviews.Content: No doubt, it's an excellent device, it's faster, lighter and more elegant that its predecessor. Good option for that person who looking for a vanguard technology.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: todo muy bien,perfecto ,era todo como lo esperaba muchas gracias,100% lo mejor ,DIOS le bendiga......excelente, excelente, agradecido y muy conforme con todo

Reviews.Title: Good cellphone
Reviews.Author: Pedro Jaime
Reviews.Content: good product fast, lightweight running noticeably faster than the previous the screen resolution is higher than the old model rather recommend

Reviews.Title: Light and slim
Reviews.Author: Carlos A. Melara
Reviews.Content: I replaced my 4S with this new model, and I'm very pleased with its light weight, slimness, and overall design.

Reviews.Title: It truly is the best iPhone yet.
Reviews.Author: Lisa M.
Reviews.Content: Before I had bought this phone, I had an iPhone 4. I loved my 4, but I had an upgrade available and the draw of the nice new design and a chance to have Siri was just too much for me to pass up. Boy am I glad I upgraded.This is the best phone I have ever had. It works quickly and flawlessly, and it very easy to use. If you love Apple, you will love this phone. And even if you've never had an iPhone before, this phone might just convert you.It takes gorgeous pictures, call quality is great, messaging is fast and easy, and I have way too much fun using apps and playing games on it. I have quite a bit of music, a ton of pictures, and a decent amount of apps on my phone right now, and I have only used about half of the memory right now, so I think the 32 gb is plenty of storage. The only reason to go higher is if you have an extensive music collection you want with you at all times and if you like to keep movies on your phone.I highly recommend this phone, you will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: Advertised as promised!
Reviews.Author: Phillip Soto
Reviews.Content: The iphone I received from "semidevil88" was in GREAT condition. Not a single scratch on the screen or back plate. Just a minor scratch near the volume rocker, which isn't really noticeable unless you pay very close attention. Phone works like a charm and works very well on T-Mobile. Phone was unlocked and ready to rock! Phone also got to my home relatively fast as well. Pretty happy!

Reviews.Title: Unlocked iphone thank you!
Reviews.Author: donald f acker
Reviews.Content: Thank you for the help, its a good buy the phone is working fine, and things are looking good! Thank you! Other than a small problem getting started everything was as promised.

Reviews.Title: Complete disappointment
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Malavolta
Reviews.Content: I have bought a iPhone on AllStar Eletronics on November 29 and I never receveid it.I asked for an order cancellation and after 5 days I didn't even got an answer.After this problem I read the revíews about AllStar Eletronics and I wouldn't buy anything from AllStar Eletronics if I have read them before.It is a complete disappointment!And I am still waiting for an answer and my reimbursement.

Reviews.Title: They sent me the wrong product
Reviews.Author: Sofia
Reviews.Content: This is my first time buying online and look what happened...I bought an iPhone 5 unlocked 32G, and they sent me an iPhone 5 blocked 64G.

Reviews.Title: The Pocket Knife of Technology
Reviews.Author: Cougar Alex
Reviews.Content: I have owned my iPhone 5 for a little over a year. This phone has changed my life in many ways and has made everyday tasks much easier. Apple first started with making computers but since then they have reached out and made other products that have pushed technology and has made a huge difference in our society. They started making iPhones in 2007 and with every release since then they have made huge improvements. The iPhone 5 weighs only 3.95 ounces and is only .3 inches thick. This is one of the lightest phones out there. It looks so slim and attractive, and fits in your hands perfectly. This brings up the one and only problem that I think the iPhone can approve on, its durability. I find it somewhat fragile but there's a simple solution, a case. There is a huge variety of cases and accessories that can make your iPhone 100% safe. The iPhone has a 4-inch widescreen multi-touch retina display with 326 pixels per inch. This phone makes every picture, video and anything else you put on the display absolutely beautiful. It has an 8-megapixel camera that can shoot 1080p HD video. With all of its features it still can hold a charge, giving you up to 8 hours of talk time or up to 40 hours of playing your favorite music. The iPhone 5 comes in black or white and with three different sizes of memory, 16GB, 32GB, and 64GB. Depending on how much data you want to store on your iPhone there is always a right size for your needs.  I myself have a 32GB iPhone 5 and I have found that to be plenty of space for all of my music, pictures and apps.There are so many features and apps that you can get for your iPhone 5 making this phone a hugely useful tool for your everyday life. The iPhone 5 is not just a phone but many other things. With this product you are constantly carrying a camera, shooting beautiful high quality pictures and videos. The iPhone 5 also has a new HDR and panoramic options, making it easy to capture the most wonderful and priceless events in your life. As a student I have used the camera to take pictures of notes or homework assignments, making it easy to remember what I need to do and study. Other useful apps are the compass, flashlight, and calculator. You can also take notes on your iPhone, making it great for students, businessmen and even mothers for when they have to write down a grocery list. You can even put events in the calendar such as birthdays, appointments or assignments that are due and it will remind you when they are. There are many games available for the iPhone even educational ones for young children all the way up to college students. The iPhone 5 has very fast LTE internet letting you surf the web and send emails in little to no time. Another amazing feature is the navigation system that is built in. No matter where you want to go the iPhone will give you turn by turn direction on how to get to your location. With all these features it is easy to forget that the iPhone 5 is also a phone. Letting you call, text and even FaceTime, bring you face to face with people miles away. This phone can really connect you to people who are close to you and even the ones you have just met. With apps like Facebook and Instagram you can connect and share your life with the people you love. This phone has something to offer for everyone whether you're a child, student, businessman or mother, the iPhone 5 has something to make your life easier.

Reviews.Title: It is a perfect tool and useful for my work
Reviews.Author: Enrique Zadoff
Reviews.Content: although the battery doesn't last as I supposed it will last, the IP 5 is a nice pone and more.

Reviews.Title: Battery is killing me
Reviews.Author: Dahc202
Reviews.Content: The battery power drastically reduced in less than 2 days of purchase from 8-10 hours down to 4-5 hours and I don't like that

Reviews.Title: Apple Needs to Step-up !!!
Reviews.Author: hrishi "hrishi"
Reviews.Content: Review from India.My phone usage is high, further I read lots of news and surf the Internet. Iphone 5 was a dream having seen my cousins and friends use apple products.I was aware of the closed apple environment, no memory upgrade, no battery change and probably one of the most expensive phones in the market (apple premium).I faced the following issues that made me change my  mind.After a full charge the phone was 25%  at 2  pm and completely drained by 4 pm. This is after manually shutting off all apps,  navigation and wifi.I had to carry three chargers for my house, car, office and a fourth emergency battery pack in my bag just to make it last the day.I found it to  heat up when used for internet surfing even for 5 mts.When I went to the local Apple store they told me that the heating issue can be rectified if I use a case and since the battery depending on usage.When I did some reading I realised iphone has a 1,440mAh battery, while the. Galaxy S III has a beefier 2,100mAh. There is a battery drain issue that apple is planning to fix.This issues was not faced by my friends who have use S G 3 or SG4 or HTC One or other phones. My old BB bold give me full days worth of talk and surf with still lot off juice in the night.After spending 900 usd (@ Rs 56) I don't think I could be expected carry a charger or buy a case. My feel is apple will rectify these issues in the next phone.Meanwhile, I have moved on.

Reviews.Title: disappointed with the iphone 5
Reviews.Author: Oli G
Reviews.Content: I've owned iPhones since their first incarnation, and have until now almost always been pleased with the developments made to the next generation over the last, with the exception of the iphone 4 and the design fault that resulted in a complete drop of signal when held in your hand without a case on it (I still own 2 of them, don't believe the spin, they really do drop signal).The 4s is a great phone, quicker than the 4 and without the signal / aerial debacle.The iPhone 5 however is a disappointment.It's thinner apparently, not that you'd notice, especially as due to it's design you have to have it in a case to prevent it from being destroyed by everyday careful usage.But in order to make it thinner they had (so they say) to change the sync lead / charger lead connector to a new smaller design. If like me you have owned and continue to own previous versions of iPhones, iPods and iPads, and have several chargers, Docks, car connectors and car chargers etc then this new design is really frustrating.The real reason that Apple changed the design is surely so that everybody has to go out and buy outrageously overpriced adaptors or new leads. I have read that Apple pays less than $0.6 for these leads, yet charges it's customers £25.Apple have also put a microchip in their leads that the iPhone is set to recognise, without which they are rejected by the iPhone in order to prevent third party manufacturers from producing leads that work properly, hence all the terrible reviews for these 3rd party products.It's just another of Apple's underhand money making exercises at the customers considerable inconvenience and expense.It's taller than the iPhone 4s. Some may like this, but I don't. The 4s sits comfortably in your hand and my thumb can reach the top of the screen on the 4s without having to change the position in my hand. I have bigger than average hands too.It is faster than the 4s, only a little, but it is faster. But this is the only improvement in my eyes.Battery life is poor, another sacrifice made to the god of (pointless) thinness. It feels cheaper and flimsier than the 4s too.Maps are a mess. Google maps was so much better on the 4 and 4s.Instead of this ridiculous connector fiasco, why couldn't we have kept the old and perfectly good connector and had wireless charging too? The technology is there, and would be a great improvement over the current system.A more robust design would be nice so that they didn't have to live in cases, and a dust and moisture resistant design would be very welcome.iCloud is fantastic, and so I can't imagine changing phones to another manufacturer until someone else comes out with something at least as good as iCloud.But when they do, I'll be more than happy to switch allegiance, despite twenty years as a loyal Apple customer.Apple can only push their customers so far, and I'm becoming more and more fed up with the way Apple is treating it's customers with regard to their infuriating thinness campaign with their phones, iPads, MacBook Pros and iMacs, at the expense of functionality and in a blatant attempt to corner the market and limit customers buying choices in terms of leads, adaptors, connections, music purchasing, app purchasing etc, as are many many other people.Apple is a great brand and has produced many fantastic products, but the iPhone 5 is not the leap ahead from the 4s that customers had hoped for, and this coupled with frustration and expense incurred by the connector design and the thinness over battery life and durability make it for me a 2 star product.If you own the 4s I'd suggest hanging on to it and waiting until Autumn for the next hopefully much improved iPhone, or Samsung, or whoever the Apple slayer will be.

Reviews.Title: Battery life is too short
Reviews.Author: Musu
Reviews.Content: Make sure to have extra charger if you plan to be away from home for a day... It never stays till you are back from work...I regret I did not choose Samsung listening to my daughter...but I like it with the application and all.

Reviews.Title: Obviously not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Deimos "."
Reviews.Content: So other than a .5" larger bordered screen and a new 9 pin connector there is nothing new here. Same old boring IOS minus google maps/youtube app (you get Apple Imaps epic fail instead) the same issues that plagued as far back as the 3gs (for me) such as getting locked in headphone mode, freezing/crashing apps, losing service for no reason and having to reboot the Iphone to get it back, being way to delicate if dropped or hit, way over priced, and the simple fact that are much better smartphones out there namly Windows Phone and Android. I have seen and personally did speed tests on browsing, boot up times and app lauching and Windows Phone 7/8 and Android beat this device hands down everytime in all catagories. They say Apple could sell a turd wrapped in tin foil with an Apple logo on it.....well this is that turd. There is no reason to buy this recycled iphone as there will be another one out in less than a year, possibly the usual Iphone 5/5s/5se/5LT/Iphone 5 Turbo/Super Iphone 5 turbo....and all makes and models will be the exact same phone lol. Wake up people, go with whats best for you, not whats popular this week. I traded this dud after a month for a Windows Phone Nokia Lumia and couldn't believe what I was missing and how limited the Iphone is. Apple is going to have to do better than Iphone 5 and Ipad mini/nano/tini to retain it's bloated, stagnent, fragile market share.
